full_summary:
# Request for Qualification (RFQ) for Shipyard Cranes

## Overview

 Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites qualified contractors to submit their proposals for the supply and installation of shipyard cranes at CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt.

## Project Details

- **Project Number:** IE12347J
- **Location:** CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia (Jetty NJ); CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia (Jetty A and B)
- **Scope:**
  - Two (2) rail-mounted portal cranes for Jetty A and B (CFB Esquimalt)
  - One (1) self-propelled, rail-mounted, level-luffing, slewing-type portal crane for Jetty NJ (CFB Halifax)
- **Work Inclusions:**
  - Design
  - Manufacturing
  - Painting
  - Inspection
  - Delivery and site assembly
  - Erection and commissioning
  - Testing and certification
  - Three-year warranty period
  - Spare parts and maintenance
  - Training
- **Estimated Cost:** $57,000,000

## Tender Requirements

- Tenderers must submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System
- Proposals must be received by the closing date and time indicated on the Electronic Bidding System
- Tenderers can obtain contract award results from the DCC Website
- Technical and commercial assessments will be conducted in accordance with the RFQ documents

## Important Dates

- Closing date: 23:00 EST on 21 May 2024 (changed from 7 May 2024)
- Non-mandatory Tenderer information session: 0930 EST on 23 April 2024

## Contact Information

- Name: Steve Kennedy
- Email: steve.kennedy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
- Phone: (613) 769-2659
